name: Poker Surf
description:
Take good olde Match 3 game to a new dimension!
Surf game pieces on the face of a 3D shape to match three or more of a kind.
Rotate the surface to see the parts of game field obscured by the folds of this 3D  form.

Arrange 3 of a kind to make them disappear. Collect 4 of a kind to get a
powerful game piece. Build a 5 of a kind combination and you'll get the
extra mighty Joker!

Collect chips by completing special levels in the game and put them to good use by buying some boosters to get much needed help with some very tough levels.
Watch an ad to earn some chips or to refill your lives or to get extra moves for finishing the level.
And if you insist you can spend some real money to replenish your chip stack.

Take on this electrifying challenge alone or invite your friends to see who
can get the top score. 15 surfaces spread over 100+ levels gonna give
you a lot of fun.

Don't be shy give it a try! Today. Right now.
